name: 洪子逸
objective: 資料庫系統與應用課程的目的在研習資料庫設計與管理技術及其在企業的應用。本課程方向包括：資料庫管理系統架構、關聯式資料模式、關聯式資料庫設計理論、關聯查詢最佳化、關聯式資料庫管理系統：以MS SQL Server為例，以實務性方式，培養學生對資料庫系統設計開發之能力。
schedule:
1 The Worlds of Database Systems
2 The Relational Model of Data
3 Design Theory for Relational Databases
4 High-Level Database Models
5 Algebraic and Logical Query Languages
6 The Database Language SQL
7 Constraints and Triggers
8 Views and Indexes
9 Midterm Proposal/Prototype
10 SQL in a Server Environment
11 Advanced Topics in Relational Databases
12 The Semistructured-Data Model
13 Programming Languages for XML
14 Secondary Storage Management
15 Index Structures
16 Query Execution
17 The Query Compiler
18 Final Project/System
